name: Privilege'o'Matic
description:
With this amazing "game" based on the intersectionality score website, you can now tell if you're privileged or opressed a special snowflake. But it has a twist, you're not bound  by choices of "White to Person of Color", "Rich to Poor", "Cysgender to Transgender", you're free to create up to 5 slides up to the value of 100 with anything you want. Some fine examples:
  • Believe in Shrek to Not believe in Shrek
  • Reddit Users to 4Chan Users
  • Jock to Nerd
  • Normie to Gamer
  • Alive to Dead
  • Minecraft to Roblox
  • Employed to NEET
  • UE4 Dev to Unity Dev
  • Switch to Elseif
  • Dave to Not Dave
Enjoy telling your friends how opressed you are so they should give you more because they are most likely very privileged.

Also pls donate moni i'm opressed unicorn-chan

PS: It is not my intention to offend anyone, hence why you can create your own sliders and blame yourself for anything bad that happens.
